twcore.core.util
Class MessageLimiter

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.util.MessageLimiter

public class MessageLimiter
extends java.lang.Object

Optional class for limiting the number of messages that can be sent to a bot from a given player within 60 seconds. (Does not apply to HighMod+.) Use BotAction's setMessageLimit(int) to run this class with a bot.

Constructor Summary
MessageLimiter(BotAction botAction, SubspaceBot bot, int rate)
          Creates a new instance of MessageLimiter with the specified message limit per minute per person.
 
Method Summary
 void handleEvent(Message event)
          Handles the message event before the bot so that the bot will not be spammed.
 void recordTime(java.lang.String name)
          Record the supplied player name as having sent a message at this time by incrementing their message count.
 void reduce(long difference)
          Reduces the count of messages from all players by the difference supplied (should be difference between current time and last time a message was received).
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

MessageLimiter

public MessageLimiter(BotAction botAction,
                      SubspaceBot bot,
                      int rate)
Creates a new instance of MessageLimiter with the specified message limit per minute per person.

Parameters:
botAction - Bot utility class
bot - Bot the limiter should apply to
rate - Number of messages allowed from a person in one minute
Method Detail

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Message event)
Handles the message event before the bot so that the bot will not be spammed. If the PM passes the message limit test, it will go through; otherwise, the player will receive a warning message and the bot will not receive the message.

Parameters:
event - Event/packet provided

reduce

public void reduce(long difference)
Reduces the count of messages from all players by the difference supplied (should be difference between current time and last time a message was received).

Parameters:
difference - Difference between current time and last time a msg was received

recordTime

public void recordTime(java.lang.String name)
Record the supplied player name as having sent a message at this time by incrementing their message count. If over the limit, warn them.

Parameters:
name -
